name: Welcome to my homepage
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Ph.D candidate in Computer Science and Technology.[ College of Computer Science](http://www.cs.zju.edu.cn/), [Zhejiang University](http://www.zju.edu.cn/)

Caoguangbiao main building Room 424 ,Computing Intelligence Lab,Hangzhou, 310027, P.R.China

fcxiong@zju.edu.cn &bearshng@gmail.com

## [Education] [Research Interests] [Publications][Skills] [Tools]


#Education

2014.09- Ph.D candidate in Computer Science and Technology.[College of Computer Science](http://www.cs.zju.edu.cn/), [Zhejiang University](http://www.zju.edu.cn/) .Supervisor:Prof.[Yuntao Qian](http://www.cs.zju.edu.cn/people/qianyt/qianyt.htm)

2010.09 --2014.07 B. E. in [ School of Software](http://www.sc.sdu.edu.cn/default.do), [ Shandong University](http://www.sdu.edu.cn/). Supervisor:Prof [ Gongping Yang](http://mla.sdu.edu.cn/ygp.html) &Prof [Jun Ma](http://ir.sdu.edu.cn/~junma/~junma_en.htm)

2011.09--2012.07 Exchange Student in [School of International Software](http://iss.whu.edu.cn/),[Wuhan University](http://www.whu.edu.cn/).


# Research Interests

Machine Learning ,Image Processing and Data Mining , Hyperspectral image processing,Tensor decomposition and its applications.
